/>
Introduction
This topic contains general information about rating principles for conditions of the auditory system, including
service connection (SC) for hearing loss and tinnitus
considering the
Duty Military Occupational Specialty (MOS) Noise Exposure Listing
and combat duties
considering National Guard and Reserve duty for hearing loss and/or tinnitus claims
, and
requesting audiometric examinations and medical opinions
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section B - Conditions of the Auditory System
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section B
